title: Marketplace Tech for Monday, January 27, 2014
description: Today Marketplace Tech kicks off a new series about sports and technology. We're calling it “Gaming the System,” and we'll be talking Olympics, World Cup, and yes, Sunday's big football game. But first let's talk about how some people are using numbers and data tracking to try and change a major U.S. sport. Not baseball, but basketball.
